mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(B.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CREATE_DATE, B.COUNT, A.*, C.NAME, C.EMP_NO FROM BOARD_SCHEDULE A JOIN PJ_BOARD B ON A.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE C ON B.WRITER = C.EMP_NO WHERE B.BOARD_NO = #{board_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_SCHEDULE VALUES (#{board_no}, #{sch_title}, #{sch_attendee}, TO_DATE(#{sch_start}, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI'), TO_DATE(#{sch_end}, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI'), #{sch_place}, #{sch_content})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD_SCHEDULE SET SCH_TITLE = #{sch_title}, SCH_ATTENDEE = #{sch_attendee}, SCH_START = TO_DATE(#{sch_start}, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI'), SCH_END = TO_DATE(#{sch_end}, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI'), SCH_PLACE = #{sch_place}, SCH_CONTENT = #{sch_content} WHERE BOARD_NO = #{board_no}

MERGE INTO SCH_ATTENDEE USING DUAL ON (EMP_NO = #{emp_no} AND BOARD_NO = #{board_no}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET STATUS = #{status} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (BOARD_NO, EMP_NO, STATUS) VALUES (#{board_no}, #{emp_no}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT B.EMP_NO, B.NAME, C.JOB_NAME FROM SCH_ATTENDEE A JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN JOB C ON B.JOB_CODE = C.JOB_CODE WHERE A.BOARD_NO = #{board_no} AND A.STATUS = 'Y' AND B.STATUS != 'Q'

AND (TO_CHAR(SCH_START, 'YYYY-MM HH24:MI') = #{date} OR TO_CHAR(SCH_END, 'YYY-MM HH24:MI') = #{date})

SELECT TO_CHAR(B.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CREATE_DATE, B.COUNT, C.NAME, C.EMP_NO, A.* FROM BOARD_SCHEDULE A JOIN PJ_BOARD B ON A.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE C ON B.WRITER = C.EMP_NO JOIN SCH_ATTENDEE D ON B.BOARD_NO = D.BOARD_NO JOIN PROJECT E ON B.PJ_NO = E.PJ_NO WHERE D.EMP_NO = #{emp_no} AND D.STATUS = 'Y' AND E.STATUS = 'Y'
